QDebug operator<< (QDebug debug, const Level &rLevel)

Detailed Description

The class Level defines the level of a logging event.

Note:
All the functions declared in this class are thread-safe.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Log4Qt::Level::Value

The enumeration Value contains all possible Level values.

Enumerator:
NULL_INT 

NULL_INT is used for no level has been specified
